list.name: Default
list.comment: Disabled coverage mode. Simplified and corrected mate pair mode.

list.name: Failed commit: Default (2)
list.comment: Changed package from debut to savant

changelist.name: Failed commit: Default (2)
changelist.comment: Changed package from debut to savant

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Don't maximize. Set accelerator keys in non-generated method.

MESSAGE.value: Fixed issue with modifier keys not affecting scrolling.
Made mac use command key and windows/linux use ctrl key for keyboard accelerators.
Fixed panning and zooming with the mouse wheel (now need command or control to zoom) and ctrl-click popup window for Mac. Now zooming using right click and drag is broken :(
Added the ability to add a mate record.
Changed all of these to use FileDialog for Mac and JFileChooser for Win/Linux. Needs testing. This comment should help with reversion if necessary.
Use JFileChooser for Windows/Linux, use FileDialog for Mac.
Implemented more efficient formatting and removed all trace of the word "Debut".
Remove auto-coverage mode.
JavaDoc. Also added instruction types for MEAN and STD_DEV used by BAMTrackRenderer in mate pair arc mode.
JavaDoc. Simplified and corrected maxValue calculation. Also, add MEAN and STD_DEV to drawing instructions.
JavaDoc. Calculate mean and standard deviation of estimated insert sizes. Added method to determine and set the read pair type. Added function to infer insert sizes.
Added some extra info to BAM file display, mostly for debugging.
Disabled coverage mode. Simplified and corrected mate pair mode.
Deleted InteralTrack because it wasn't being used.
New JavaDoc.
Disabled copy to clipboard and save image to file since they don't work.
Display a progress bar in indeterminate mode and a wait cursor while formatting.
Take out rendering based on statistics.
Don't include statistics in drawing instructions.
Don't calculate statistics.
Pre-sort interval formats by position.
Added libraries needed for ExternalSort.
Don't maximize. Set accelerator keys in non-generated method.
